item.title: Darktable: Recreate this look #1
item.description: A while ago, someone asked online how to recreate the look of sanghan. Here is my attempt at showing how to do this using darktable 3.6. Here is the end product of the edit. I found this image on Signature Edits Here is our starting point. Notice that the conditions are similar to the images we are using as inspiration. It’s a lot easier to achieve a look when your lighting conditions are close.
